content: this floral 12 square pattern comes in 2 different designs both squares have the same stitch count on each side so you can easily interchange them or even create a blanket by mixing and matching ***this crochet pattern is available for free on my website visit pattern website link above or you can download it here on ravelry as a print-optimized ad-free pdf *** **difficulty ** easy/intermediate **materials needed ** 5mm h hook or hook needed to obtain gauge 135-150 yds #4 worsted weight red heart with love in eggshell or red heart super saver in frosty green or the color of your choice yarn needle scissors optional stitch markers **stitches used ** chain = chain slip_stitch = slip_stitch single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet **additional terms ** 3dc cluster = dc3tog in same stitch 3tr cluster = tr3tog in same stitch cross stitch = skip st double_crochet in next st cross over st just made and double_crochet in skipped st cross stitch increase = double_crochet in next unworked st cross over st just made double_crochet in previous st see picture tutorial at bottom of pattern if you are stuck st/sts = stitch/stitches space/sps = space/spaces **gauge ** circle measures 7 across after round 8 **measurements ** 12 by 12 when finished **additional notes ** -chain 1 at beginning of round does not count as a stitch
